name: Puzzle Playing Cards
description:
Puzzle Playing Cards is brought back to life in a all new interactive gameplay experience! Featuring multiple ways to play, from classic rules to custom lobby settings. No two matches will feel the same!
The objective is to score the most points before other players do by matching 3 or 4 cards of the same set! Only then you will be able to call Puzzle Playing Cards and raise up the scoreboard.
Compete against the vast world of fierce opponents and clime the global leaderboards!
